title: All-Purpose Putty, Putty Filler, Spackling for Drywall, Quick Drying, Designed for Interior and Exterior Home Use, Paintable, Permanent, Non-Shrinking, 500g

raw_desc: Filling cracks and holes on surfaces where no structural movement occurs Filling and repairing cracks and chips in walls ceilings, doors, windows etc. Recommended for both interior and exterior applications
